channel.title: RivalScape 748 | 24/7 | 28 Npc Tele | 9 MiniGames | Eco | Up2D8t | Join Now!
channel.description:
[CENTER] [url=http://rs.rivalgamers.co.uk][img]http://i.imgur.com/XuPrWzX.png[/img][/url]
[font=times new roman][SIZE=5]WebClient: [url=http://rs.rivalgamers.co.uk]Click Here[/url] owner: ownprox[/SIZE][/font]
[SIZE=5][font=times new roman]Features:[/font][/SIZE] Online 24/7 Dedicated Server Hosted I Own 2 (8gb Ram, 8 Core @ 3.5 GHZ, 1 Gbps Net | Can Handle 1000 players) Unlike other servers this is not an attempt to get rich or make money im 23, I have a job programming from home player suggestions taken into consideration Bugs patched as soon as they are found Always Updated 9 Fun MiniGames (more coming soon) 14 Training Teleports (more coming soon) 13 Bosses to Conquer (more coming soon) Flawless Pvp/Pvn Home is Varrock/Edgeville Economy Based Grand Exchange - Flawless
[SIZE=5][font=times new roman]MiniGames:[/font][/SIZE] Fight Caves Barrows Duel Arena Castle Wars Survival Dungeon Clan Wars The Kiln Pest Control (its done just need to add the teleport) Soul Wars (got a few issues to fix before making it live)
[SIZE=5][font=times new roman]Bosses:[/font][/SIZE] God Wars King Black Dragon Corporeal Beast Grotworm Lair (QBD) Pest Queen Glacor's Icy Caves Wildy Wyrm Avatar of Destruction Ice Strykewyms Blink Sunfreet Party Demon Mercenary Mage
[font=times new roman][size=5]Skills:[/SIZE][/font] Attack Hitpoints Strength Defence Range Prayer Magic Theiving Mining Agility Fishing Woodcutting Summoning Smiting Dungeoneering Slayer Runecrafting Hunting Herblore Farming Fire making Fleching Crafting Cooking Construction
[SIZE=5][font=times new roman]Patch Logs:[/font][/SIZE] 21/02/2015: fixed players online box made it cleaner added house portal to varrock central added bank to varrock central increased forum speed Server Crash fixed down to accessing player variables when a player is logged out
20/02/15: Prices Updated to current runescape prices Bones on altar xp rate fixed New Website Forum done
19/02/2015 Client loader added due to people failing to be able to use fullscreen due to not setting ram, my loader works flawlessly at loading the client with fullscreen working fine
at the moment im dumping all original rs prices worked my way through 14243 so far got around 15,000 to get mind you im only using 2 proxy's to dump them so its taking some time
18/02/15: Home is now Varrock a ton more training teleports added random client crash issues patched
16/02/15: Soul Wars Added Pest Control Added Caste Wars Added 2 Duel Arena Dupe Fix's Duel Arena Added Improved Firemaking Bones on Altar Burying Bones 3 Dwaf Cannons working Enchanting Bolts Enchantments on all items Jewlry Smithing Widerness Obelisks Soaking formula's Fairy Rings Added
[SIZE=5][font=times new roman]Screenshots:[/font][/SIZE] [url=http://rs.rivalgamers.co.uk] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gdudwBt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/c2ed42180c61679a1e17e51eb01c5bd0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/508988920e81fb0b331f28964504b809.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/456939270d79e587e6f7edc97baa1dcd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/4a30e9fedae983f8670126176e01d1dd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/dbef9d14f339af72fe381e22ccc337ef.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/f62b34751af840321cc4615ae718ff60.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/6dc17eb6b5a4fa96b16a51148917c323.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/336a7f5826c5444d3eee289eb8cca019.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/29a6fdfb56edcc06c133d7dc79f8a440.png[/img][/url][/CENTER]

[SIZE=5][font=times new roman]Features:[/font][/SIZE]

Unlike other servers this is not an attempt to get rich or make money im 23, I have a job programming from home

[SIZE=5][font=times new roman]Patch Logs:[/font][/SIZE]
21/02/2015:
fixed players online box made it cleaner
added house portal to varrock central
added bank to varrock central
increased forum speed
Server Crash fixed down to accessing player variables when a player is logged out

20/02/15:
Prices Updated to current runescape prices
Bones on altar xp rate fixed
New Website
Forum done

19/02/2015
Client loader added due to people failing to be able to use fullscreen due to not setting ram, my loader works flawlessly at loading the client with fullscreen working fine

at the moment im dumping all original rs prices worked my way through 14243 so far got around 15,000 to get mind you im only using 2 proxy’s to dump them so its taking some time

18/02/15:
Home is now Varrock
a ton more training teleports added
random client crash issues patched
